hibernate-mapping.query: select loan.loanAmount from org.mifos.accounts.loan.business.LoanBO as loan, org.mifos.accounts.business.AccountStatusChangeHistoryEntity as history where loan.accountId = history.account.accountId and history.accountStatusChangeId = ( select max(completeStatusHistory.accountStatusChangeId) from org.mifos.accounts.business.AccountStatusChangeHistoryEntity as completeStatusHistory,org.mifos.accounts.loan.business.LoanBO as completeLoanObject where completeLoanObject.accountId=completeStatusHistory.account.accountId and completeLoanObject.customer.customerId=:CUSTOMERID and completeStatusHistory.newStatus=6)
